extendedInfo.description: Finally, the #1 cocktail recipe app for the iPhone has come to Android! Whether you're a novice bartender or a full-blown mixologist, you've got to download this app.â THOUSANDS OF RECIPESBrowse and search through 7,900+ drink recipes and 1,300+ ingredients.â METRIC/IMPERIAL UNITSMetric and Imperial (US) units can be chosen for all drink recipes with the click of one button on the "More" tab.â CUSTOM DRINKSAdd your own custom drink recipes to the library.â LIQUOR CABINETThe "Liquor Cabinet" tab lets you enter all the liquor and mixer types you have on hand--and search the entire database for all the cocktails you're able to make.â RANDOM DRINKSThe "Random" tab has a slot-machine interface, which lets you find random cocktail recipes based on liquor, mixer, and glassware criteria. The Cabinet and Random features are user-friendly because we've broken down 1,300+ ingredients into 87 categories.â LIQUOR STORE LOCATORFind nearby liquor stores using Google maps and GPS.â DRINK RECIPE CATEGORIESCocktails, Martinis, Shooters, Jello Shots, Hot Drinks, Punches, Non-Alcoholic, and Favorites.â LEARN BARTENDING TERMINOLOGY & TECHNIQUESThe "Bartending" tab supplies info on Glassware, Tools of the Trade, Terminology, How to Stock Your Bar, and Bartending Tips & Tricks.â AWARD WINNING APPOver 8500 articles have been written about our drink recipe apps...in books, magazines, and web sites from the likes of Gizmodo.com, Mashable.com, Time Magazine, and O'Reilly Media. Furthermore, our team includes a veteran of the food and beverage industry.â APP TO SDYou may move this app to your SD card to save space on your phone. However, you may not move the 6 MB database, just everything else. Moving the database to the SD card is wrong on multiple levels. Please accept this fact and enjoy the app! Thanks.(From the creators of Mixology)

reviews.title: Love it on iPhone but...
reviews.comment: As some other readers pointed out... he ability to choose specific types of Cabinet Selections on the iPhone is fantastic and the feature I miss the most. I wish the developer adds the same features for the Android app. Until then my rating stands.
reviews.author: Andre K

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t really make sense.  The UI is confusing at times.  Sometimes it pulls from my liquor cabinet and sometimes no???  I searched for drinks including vodka and got one result.... really???? Wish I could get my money back.
reviews.author: Tim Waggoner

reviews.comment: I love this app but it keep force closing on me fix that and I will give ot 5 stars
reviews.author: Gina Vargas

reviews.title: Waste of money!!
reviews.comment: I can\'t even believe I paid for this app. It is missing a lot classic drink recipes. The recipes it does have are either:completely off and wrong, or something absolutely NOBODY has ever heard of. You\'re not a real bartender if you like this app. It\'s definitely not up to mixologist standards.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: I upgraded and the contents are the same as the free app with no additional content and it won\'t let me pick my choice of liquor after I remove one
reviews.author: Michelle Blair

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I was getting bored with vodka cranes so I bought this app and now once a week I pick out \303\240 random drink and have my bartender create it. Gives us something to look forward too.
reviews.author: Teresa Pierce

reviews.title: Weird glitches and no text.
reviews.comment: For HTC sensation users. I keep getting a blank blue screen for almost all recipes. Sometimes the ingredients will display for a fraction of a second and then the screen goes back to being blank and blue. What the hell happened? Why does this keep happening!? If I click on the screen in certain areas it will show another page giving a definition of the item I apparently hit. But when I go back it is a blank screen. Fix this issue and put in proper measurements! The classic drinks are all fucked up.
reviews.author: nick sisneros

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: Nice app, looks alright, though I wish there was an option to view the list of drinks with white text on a black (or the apps blue) background; otherwise viewing in a dark room can be jarring.   I would like to see more options for customization, again a great start is the custom drinks options, however, some of the recipes I\'ve had need ingredients that aren\'t on the lists of them (like Iced Cake vodka, blackberry syrup, moonshine), it would be nice to be able to add custom ingredients. Even better if you can add you\'re own descriptions of them.   That\'s just one quip I have about the app; though, like I said, it\'s a great start for this app
reviews.author: Travis Gaus

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I\'m a bartender, and this app. Helps when someone orders a drink I\'ve never heard of, or I can\'t remember how to make!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad recipes, waste of money
reviews.comment: I\'ve never wasted so much  good liquor in my life until I started trying recipes from this app. They clearly will add any recipe to the list just for the sake of having more recipes. Don\'t even bother, just use Google or something.
reviews.author: Grant Goodman

reviews.title: Unfortunately, iPhone Is Better
reviews.comment: I\'m a die hard android fan, but on this one I\'d have to say the iPhone version wins. The ability to choose specific types of Cabinet Selections on the iPhone is fantastic and the feature I miss the most. Other reasons are the Top Rated Drinks and the option to rate individual drinks.  I love this app and it would be a disappointment to switch back to the iPhone version. Please update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked great,  now broken
reviews.comment: Used to work great, loved the cabinet, paid money for it and now the recipes don\'t have measurements next to them. Also, why in the hell does this need GPS positioning permissions? What the hell? Please fix this ASAP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yuck
reviews.comment: I have it on my ipod and its my favorite app but this android one sucks. Doesn\'t have ratings, comments, and more that makes my apple app heads above the rest. The cocktails aren\'t all correct so you\'re taking a risk with every recipe here. On my ipod the ratings tell me if the recipe is worth my liquor
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bought the paid version to avoid gay porn ads.
reviews.comment: But otherwise a good cocktail app.
reviews.author: Scott Pratschner

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Nice app until you try to view a specific recipe. Either blank screen or unable to see measurements of ingredients. Please fix.
reviews.author: Joe Nagy

reviews.title: Good, but
reviews.comment: Good but why can\'t you add your own ingredients to the lists. There are so many brands out there, that certain drinks call for. Certain drinks you love to substitute your own favourites but again not on the list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Minor letdowns
reviews.comment: Was a good app but minor display issues present on HTC Sensation when there are parts of lists where the /n codes are still present so the text looks horrible.  Please fix.
reviews.author: Robert Donaldson

reviews.title: What happened to this App?????
reviews.comment: I had this on my last phone and loved it. I haven\'t used it in a while and just installed on the new phone. Very disappointing!!!!  What happened to all the great features???  Waste of money.
reviews.author: Lisa Nichols

reviews.title: Was a good app.
reviews.comment: Developer dropped support. Could have been great. Download Shizzle instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 star.
reviews.comment: No app could ever keep up with the amount of new drinks and new liquors that appear every month.  But this one has a lot of the basics covered.
reviews.author: A Google User
